nodes.text: The Iron Assembler was a rogue Vulture-class droid starfighter. It was spotted in the Naboo system in 1 ABY.

The Iron Assembler is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It is possible that this droid was a member of the Scintilla Scavengers, a group of rogue droid starfighters from the same game that mined iron asteroids in the Naboo system.
